_scopesDocumentation.criticalInfo: IMPORTANT: 'atproto transition:generic' scope is DEPRECATED and causes 'Bad token scope' errors
_scopesDocumentation.migrationReason: Bluesky rolled out granular permissions system. Apps must use specific scope strings for each permission type.

scopeExplanations.repo:*: Full permission (create, update, delete) on ALL record types in user's repository - wildcard covers all collections
scopeExplanations.rpc:com.atproto.repo.createRecord?aud=*: RPC permission to create new records on any ATProto service (aud=* means any audience/service)
scopeExplanations.rpc:com.atproto.repo.putRecord?aud=*: RPC permission to update/put existing records on any ATProto service
scopeExplanations.rpc:com.atproto.repo.deleteRecord?aud=*: RPC permission to delete records on any ATProto service
scopeExplanations.rpc:com.atproto.repo.listRecords?aud=*: RPC permission to list/query records on any ATProto service
scopeExplanations.rpc:com.atproto.repo.getRecord?aud=*: RPC permission to retrieve specific records on any ATProto service
scopeExplanations.rpc:com.atproto.server.getSession?aud=*: RPC permission to get session information on any ATProto service (needed for auth)
scopeExplanations.blob:*/*: Permission to upload any MIME type of blob/file (images, videos, etc.)

_scopesDocumentation.scopeSyntax: Format: 'permission:resource?param=value&param2=value2' - case sensitive, uses subset of ASCII

alternativeFormats.wildcardRules: Either lxm or aud can be wildcard (*), but NOT both simultaneously

_scopesDocumentation.deploymentNote: These exact scopes were tested and working as of Jan 17, 2025
_scopesDocumentation.warningForFutureDevelopers: ‚ö†Ô∏è  DO NOT REVERT TO 'atproto transition:generic' - causes authentication failures. Use these granular permissions.
_scopesDocumentation.troubleshooting: If you get 'Bad token scope' errors, verify these exact scope strings are being used in both package.json and client-metadata.json

oauth.scopes: atproto repo:* rpc:com.atproto.repo.createRecord?aud=* rpc:com.atproto.repo.putRecord?aud=* rpc:com.atproto.repo.deleteRecord?aud=* rpc:com.atproto.repo.listRecords?aud=* rpc:com.atproto.repo.getRecord?aud=* rpc:com.atproto.server.getSession?aud=* blob:*/*
oauth.clientName: Wukkie.uk - Bug Tracker for the World
oauth.description: OAuth configuration for Bluesky/ATProto integration with granular permissions (updated Jan 2025)
